name: awakening
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.
flavor_text.platinum: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.
